q1.title: What services does Naseh offer?
q1.description: Naseh offers a comprehensive range of legal services including legal consultations, document management, case tracking, and direct communication with qualified lawyers. Our platform provides both scheduled and urgent consultation options, along with specialized services for corporate clients.

q2.title: Is there a fee to use?
q2.description: Basic access to Naseh is free. However, specific services such as lawyer consultations and document processing may incur fees. All fees are clearly displayed before you commit to any service, ensuring complete transparency.

q3.title: Can I track the progress of my legal case through Naseh?
q3.description: Yes, Naseh provides real-time case tracking features. You can monitor updates, view document status, track consultation history, and receive notifications about important developments in your case through our secure platform.

q4.title: What types of legal issues can Naseh help with?
q4.description: Naseh supports a wide range of legal matters including corporate law, civil cases, contract review, employment law, and general legal consultations. Our network of specialized lawyers covers various legal domains to meet your specific needs.

q5.title: Can I upload and manage legal documents on Naseh?
q5.description: Yes, Naseh provides secure document management features. You can upload, store, and organize your legal documents in our encrypted platform, share them with your lawyer, and track document versions and status updates.

q6.title: How can I find a lawyer using Naseh?
q6.description: You can easily find a lawyer through our platform by browsing profiles, filtering by specialization, reading reviews, and checking availability. Our matching system also helps connect you with lawyers best suited to your specific legal needs.

q7.title: How can I schedule a consultation with a lawyer?
q7.description: Scheduling a consultation is simple through our platform. You can book either urgent or scheduled consultations, choose your preferred time slot, and receive immediate confirmation. The process can be completed in just a few clicks.

q8.title: Is Naseh available 24/7?
q8.description: Yes, our platform is accessible 24/7 for document management and information access. For lawyer consultations, availability varies based on individual schedules, but our urgent consultation service ensures you can get legal help when needed.

q9.title: How secure is my information on Naseh?
q9.description: We implement enterprise-grade security measures to protect your data. This includes end-to-end encryption, secure data storage, regular security audits, and strict access controls to ensure your legal information remains confidential.

q10.title: How do I contact customer support if I have issues with the app?
q10.description: Our customer support team is available through multiple channels including in-app chat, email, and phone support. We provide 24/7 technical assistance and aim to resolve all queries within 24 hours.
